B_mode_outputs module¶

B_mode_outputs.image_plot(B_mode_array, beam_spacing, axial_samples, num_beams, f_s, c)¶

Calculate Lateral distance and depth of image in meters using data from JSON file and display file using matplotlib

Parameters:
  • B_mode_array – completed 2D numpy array of B-mode data that has undergone all image processing
  • beam_spacing – distance between beams in meters
  • axial_samples – # of samples in the axial direction
  • num_beams – number of beams
  • f_s – sampling frequency in Hz
  • c – speed of sound
Returns:

None
B_mode_outputs.image_save(image_filename, B_mode_array, beam_spacing, axial_samples, num_beams, f_s, c)¶

Save B-mode image under specified file name

Parameters:
  • image_filename – User specified filename to save B-mode image to
  • B_mode_array – completed 2D numpy array of B-mode data that has undergone all image processing
  • beam_spacing – distance between beams in meters
  • axial_samples – # of samples in the axial direction
  • num_beams – number of beams
  • f_s – sampling frequency in Hz
  • c – speed of sound
Returns:
